post.desc:
I really, really want to see an MoP episode where Yukari made Tenshi "a bit dead" 😩 Yukari at that point was definitely serious, and pissed off.

Imagine an entire season's worth dedicated to SWR... 🤔 Wait, no. I'd actually want IaMP first...

Anyway, in case you're wondering what [**"T-Light"**](https://shinobicreative.com/blogs/animator-guidance-blogs/what-is-t-lightt光-effects-understanding-t-light-effects-in-japanese-animation) is – basically, it's the glowing effect.
